item.title: Simple list view with Apollo
item.description: Introduction I’ve been playing around with GraphQL lately and that’s fun. After playing with GraphQL for a while, I thought I’d write about it in a series of articles. The best way to get started with GraphQL now is to start with these two great sites to grasp the concept. Introduction to GraphQL The Fullstack Tutorial for GraphQL However, as soon as you follow these tutorials, you will start setting up the database and ORM.
